- [ ] Signal / source name review (usually [Roni](https://docs.google.com/document/d/10hGd4Evce4lJ4VkWaQEKFQxvmw2P4xyYGtIAWF52Sf8/edit?usp=sharing))
- [ ] Verify licensing terms and any applicable DUA restrictions
